channel.title: Hash-Map on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Hash-Map on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 729 My Calendar I
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 729 Question You are implementing a program to use as your calendar.

item.title: Problem 884 Uncommon Words From Two Sentences
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 884 Question A sentence is a string of single-space separated words where each word consists only of lowercase letters.

item.title: Problem 1684 Count the Number of Consistent Strings
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1684 Question You are given a string allowed consisting of distinct characters and an array of strings words.

item.title: Problem 3238 Find the Number of Winning Players
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3238 Question You are given an integer n representing the number of players in a game and a 2D array pick where pick[i] = [xi, yi] represents that the player xi picked a ball of color yi.

item.title: Problem 299 Bulls and Cows
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 299 Question You are playing the Bulls and Cows game with your friend.

item.title: Problem 1122 Relative Sort Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1122 Question Given two arrays arr1 and arr2, the elements of arr2 are distinct, and all elements in arr2 are also in arr1.

item.title: Problem 846 Hand of Straights
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 846 Question Alice has some number of cards and she wants to rearrange the cards into groups so that each group is of size groupSize, and consists of groupSize consecutive cards.
